text: Scrubs is an American sitcom. It is about doctors and nurses in a hospital, and the title Scrubs comes from the name of the clothes they wear to keep themselves from getting dirty. The series, which ran for nine seasons, was well known for its creative flashbacks and fantasies. ==Season One== The first season introduces John Michael "J.D." Dorian and his best friend Christopher Turk in their first year out of medical school as interns at Sacred Heart Hospital. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2001 American television series debuts Category:2010 American television series endings Category:2000s American drama television series Category:2000s American sitcoms Category:2000s American workplace television series Category:2000s comedy-drama television series Category:2000s medical television series Category:2000s workplace comedy television series Category:2000s workplace drama television series Category:2010s American drama television series Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:2010s American workplace television series Category:2010s comedy-drama television series Category:2010s medical television series Category:2010s workplace comedy television series Category:2010s workplace drama television series Category:American comedy- drama television series Category:American medical television series Category:American workplace comedy television series Category:American workplace drama television series Category:NBC network series Category:Television series by Buena Vista Television Category:English-language television programs
